response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which is valued at $1,200,000 to both you and me. Considering its exceptional quality and unparalleled benefits, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,100,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire an item that holds immense value, not just financially but also in terms of its impact on your endeavors. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and aligns with your investment goals. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further details.", "product_price": 1100000}
